response.overview: Lu Sheng runs a love studio called "Confession Volleyball" together with his long-lost friends Dahua and Qiqi. The studio is responsible for making careful plans for clients to help them find their sweethearts. However, the company's operation was bleak, and there has never been a successful case. Just when the studio was about to close and close down, a special guest walked in. The girl this person wanted to pursue turned out to be Lu Sheng's first love girlfriend Liu Yingying. Lu Sheng, who was longing for his first love and reluctant to part with it, was forced to make a living and finally reluctantly pursued this business. However, he was blocked and made things difficult. In the end, Lu Sheng made up his mind and successfully recovered his first love with sincerity. Lover Liu Yingying. When Lu Sheng thought that his company was completely bankrupt and was going to leave with Liu Yingying, he suddenly found that there was an extra 500,000 yuan in the account...
response.title: Love Expert
